title: Interpretation of the cross in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the cross in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the cross in a dream suggests false witness. It also deceives and gossip. Seeing the cross in a dream symbolizes marriage, anxiety, conflict, and a corrupt marriage. The meaning of seeing the cross in a dream for a Christian. The cross in a dream indicates a Christian man’s behavior. Whoever dreams of a bright and bright cross, shows kindness and following a system Wide food. It also symbolizes distance from dangers and crises. The Christian dream of the cross is a sign of a new beginning. A Christian seeing this device will be sent tomorrow indicates obtaining a new job. The cross in a woman’s dream shows the honor and morals of the fortuneteller. The meaning of seeing the cross for a single girl. An unmarried girl dreams of seeing Stavrosvi Her sleep is not worthy of praise. It is a sign of the presence of a liar in her life. Whoever sees the cross in his dream shows her love for someone who prays to her. Anyone who sees herself wearing a cross in her dream symbolizes failure in her romantic relationships. As indicated by canceling the engagement for the fiancée. Interpretation of seeing the cross for a married woman. The cross in a dream A married woman is a sign of problems and quarrels between her and her husband. As I point out, bad luck to see. Who do you see yourself in? Wearing a cross in her dream is a sign of psychological and social crises for the dreamer. The meaning of seeing the use of a cross. A Muslim who dreams of wearing a cross in his sleep, whether indoors. The neck or hand is a sign that she follows his personal and worldly desires and is far from the afterlife. And religion. For a Christian to wear it indicates good luck and good morals. The concept of drawing a cross. Drawing a cross or a tattoo in general in a dream is undesirable. Whoever draws a bird in his dream declares that his luck and his life will not be straight in reality. Who sees himself? Draw a cross on the shoulder or the hand shows his life. Counterfeit in reality. Add the dream you would like to interpret, indicating your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

It also symbolizes the distance from dangers and crises. The Christian dream of the cross is a sign of a new beginning. A Christian sees that this device will be sent tomorrow indicates getting a new job. The cross in a woman's dream shows the honor and morals of the fortuneteller. The meaning of seeing the cross for a single girl An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing Stavros in her sleep is not worthy of praise. It is a sign of the presence of a liar in her life. Whoever sees the cross in his dream shows her love for someone who is not hers. Anyone who sees herself wearing a cross in her dream symbolizes failure in her romantic relationships. The meaning of seeing the use of the cross A Muslim who dreams of wearing a cross in his sleep, whether on the inside of the neck or hand, is a sign that he follows his personal and worldly whims and is far from the afterlife and religion. Wearing it for a Christian indicates good luck and good morals. The concept of drawing a cross Drawing a cross or tattoo in general in a dream is undesirable. Whoever draws a bird in his dream announces that his luck and life are not straight in reality. Who sees himself? Drawing a cross on the shoulder or hand shows his fake life in reality. title: What is the interpretation of seeing Hassan’s full name in a dream?

preview.html: Hadouta offers you an interpretation of seeing the full name Hassan in a dream. The name Hassan is one of the well-known male names in the Arab world. Also, seeing or hearing the name Hassan in a dream is the business of many people. Therefore, we provide you with all the details and meanings regarding the meaning of the full name Hassan in a dream for a common woman, as well as the interpretation of the full name Hassan in a dream for married and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Interpretation of the full name Hassan in a dream for an unmarried woman - Ibn SirinWhy do you dream? An unmarried girl with a good reputation says that she will hear good news. Also, seeing Hassan, the full name of an unmarried woman, in a dream indicates her marriage to a young man of good character and religion. In addition, seeing a man named Hassan in a girl’s dream means kindness, support, and happy events that You will see it. Seeing a girl’s full name in a dream is a sign of her kindness and good treatment of religion and high morals. Why does the name Hassan dream of a married woman? Seeing a married woman’s full name in a dream speaks of improving circumstances and a stable life. Seeing a full woman in a dream calling her husband well indicates To the good condition of her husband, receiving useful things for him and ending their differences. The full name Hassan in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to children. In addition, seeing the name Hassan in a married woman’s dream is an excellent sign of kindness, support and positive changes in her life. The name Hassan in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the full name Hassan in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news that God will bless her with a male child. Moreover, the scene in Asmaa Hassan’s dream indicates that she had an easy birth and came out of the pregnancy without any issues or problems. To dream With a well-written name for a pregnant woman is a happy and good omen for her, and it is good to name the baby with this name. Why does the name Hassan dream of a man? Interpretation of the name of a good person in a dream indicates a new life from which all worries and sorrows will be removed. In addition, seeing the name Hassan Al-Kamil in a dream indicates kindness and support that will come to his life in the coming days. The name Hassan indicates good character and religion, the dreamer’s closeness to his religion, and his distance from suspicion and taboos. Also, the name Hassan in a man’s dream indicates the fulfillment of his desires and goals and the attainment of high and lofty positions. This vision also indicates good circumstances, better circumstances, an end to suffering, and the timely relief of Almighty God. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Seeing the sea drying up in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, we will discuss with you all the interpretations related to the vision in detail. Follow us Seeing the sea drying up in a dream Seeing the sea drying up in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from a lack of money, and it also indicates that the dreamer is exposed to many problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that the sea is dry and dry, this indicates disagreements, problems, and instability in her marriage. If If a pregnant woman sees the sea dry, the dream shows the suffering and difficulties she will face during childbirth. But if a girl sees a dry sea in a dream, this indicates the problems she faces with her fiancé. Seeing the sea in front of the house and it appears to have waves, the dream shows the problems the dreamer faces. Seeing a calm sea in a dream is evidence of the satisfaction of desires as well as the stability of marital life. Seeing the sea drying up in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees a dry sea in a dream, the vision indicates that he is suffering from poverty. And if he works in a job and sees this vision, He will lose his job and suffer from adversity and problems. If a married woman suffers from delayed pregnancy and sees a dry sea, the dream indicates her marital suffering from delayed pregnancy. If the dreamer sees that his house is submerged in sea water, then the vision indicates the presence of two enemies chasing him, but the dreamer can get rid of them. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his house has become an important part of the sea, then the vision indicates that the dreamer is doing wrong things. We have chosen for you: Sea level rising in a dream. Seeing the sea drying up in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says if the dreamer sees in a dream the sea in front of his house. The vision indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer’s dreams. It also indicates the arrival of livelihood and money, and if the dreamer is a student, the vision indicates his success, excellence, and obtaining the highest bicycles. Seeing the sea as a flood in front of the house means that the dreamer will face many problems and troubles. In the event that a woman sees If an unmarried woman sees the sea in front of her house, the vision indicates that her marriage is approaching. However, if a married woman sees in a dream the sea in front of her house, then the vision indicates that she is facing many problems and troubles. If a pregnant woman sees this vision, the vision indicates the imminent birth and that the fetus is healthy. Good. Interpretation of the sea being dry in a dream for a man. If a man sees in a dream that he is swimming in a raging sea, then the vision shows the great good that will come to him and his family members. If the dreamer sees a calm sea in a dream, this is evidence of the stability of his marital life. Seeing a clear and calm sea in a dream It is an indication of the good reputation that the dreamer has. But if someone sees in a dream that he is afraid of the sea, then the dream shows his extreme fear for his future and losing his job. If the dreamer is a merchant and will start new projects, then the vision is good news for achieving a lot of profits that It will change his life. In the event that the dreamer sees the raging sea and is already sick, the vision indicates a delay in his recovery. See also: Swimming in the sea in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream in the form of light

preview.html: Seeing the Messenger is the desire of every Muslim. This is why many people are exposed to seeing the Messenger in a dream or seeing him represented in the light because we do not know his true form. A light body in detail. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Messenger in a dream in the form of light. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the Messenger in the form of light indicates the fulfillment of difficult desires that the dreamer has always desired. Also, the appearance of the Messenger in the form of light indicates circumstances The good dreamer, his closeness to God Almighty, his commitment to duties and obligations of obedience, and his following the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Peace be upon him. Seeing the Messenger in the form of light may be an indication that the dreamer will visit the Prophet’s Mosque and the Great Mosque in Mecca to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals. Interpretation of a dream about eyelashes in a dream. The virtue of seeing the Messenger in a dream. Many dream interpreters confirm that everyone who sees the Messenger in his dream He can see it in reality, because Satan does not incarnate in the image of the Messenger, so it is considered a promising vision for the dreamer of blessings, livelihood, and health. A married woman who delays childbearing and sees the Messenger in her dream, may God Almighty be pleased with her that she fulfills her dream and gives birth to a child bearing the name of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Seeing an anxious or sad person or a person suffering from difficult problems and multiple crises, and seeing the Messenger in a dream can herald the end of These crises, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a house in a dream. Seeing the Messenger in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin believes that a girl who delays marriage, and who sees the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in her dream, will soon marry the man she desires. Seeing the Messenger in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates However, the girl’s circumstances are good, and she enjoys good behavior and love from those around her. If the dreamer has committed some sins and taboos in the past, then seeing the Messenger in her dream could be a sign of repentance that this girl will turn to God Almighty and avoid doing those forbidden things. Seeing the Messenger In a dream for an unmarried girl, it is a sign of marriage to a righteous husband who helps her get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a fox in a dream. Seeing the Messenger in a dream without seeing his face. Many of us see the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing his face. This may be a sign of comfort. After the upcoming difficulty on the dreamer’s path. Whoever has many debts and financial problems, seeing the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, can herald the end of those debts once and for all in the coming season. Seeing the Messenger in a divorced woman’s dream indicates good circumstances for that lady and a change in her life for the better. In the near future. Seeing the Messenger without his face in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of safety and good health enjoyed by the dreamer and the fetus. Interpretation of seeing ink in a dream for an unmarried woman. Advocates of seeing the Messenger in a dream. Seeing the Messenger for an unmarried person foretells that he will marry a good life partner who It helps him get closer to God Almighty, whether in a man’s or woman’s dream. Also, seeing the Messenger indicates the arrival of great wealth or wealth.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a small calf in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a young calf by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a young calf in a dream indicates good nutrition and abundance. Seeing a precious calf in a dream means a year filled with many good things. To see yourself eating the meat of a tender young calf indicates suffering and a serious illness. Seeing a calf riding in a dream means that his control It indicates the end of worries and troubles. Interpretation of a dream about a small calf for a single woman. A girl’s dream of seeing a white calf is a sign of happy news and good news for marriage soon. Slaughtering a calf in a dream indicates a late marriage. Seeing a calf in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing a calf for a married woman. Vision A calf in a married woman’s dream means sustenance, blessing, and kindness, and it is one of the dreams worthy of praise. The calf indicates that this woman’s husband will find a new job that will be in his favor. The death of a calf in a dream is evidence of many misfortunes that she will experience in her life. A fat calf in a dream For a woman, it is a sign of a stable married life. Slaughtering a calf is an undesirable dream, because it indicates the worries and arguments that occur between her and her husband. Seeing a pregnant calf If a pregnant woman sees a calf in a dream, this is good news for a male child. Seeing a calf in a dream also indicates the approaching Date of birth. The calf in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of achieving goals and dreams and sustenance with money and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a small calf for a man. Seeing a black calf entering the house indicates kindness and food. A black calf indicates freedom from worries and relief from anxiety. A man dreams of seeing a peeled calf in a dream. It is a sign of the problems and misfortunes that he is experiencing. Seeing a man slaughtering a dream in a dream is evidence of his wife’s pregnancy in the near future. Seeing a calf slaughtered and then eating its meat indicates gain and profit. The white calf indicates the dreamer’s ambition. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the situation. Social media in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it in detail

preview.html: Seeing a car accident in a dream symbolizes falling into trouble and misfortune as a result of bad actions, and a dream of overturning a car shows negative results at work due to recklessness. Whoever sees himself escaping a car accident in a dream, this is evidence of temporary worries and problems approaching the end, and the accident in the dream in general. Evidence of exposure to shock from human actions or as a result of work, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dreaming of a car accident indicates a loss of pride and prestige among people. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing losing control of a car in a dream by falling into turmoil as a result of the following desires, and seeing A car accident due to fast driving in a dream may indicate recklessness in dealing with problems and difficulties, and whoever sees that it collides with another car and an accident occurs in a dream, he collides with others and quarrels or quarrels. If you see an accident between two cars in a dream, this indicates great turmoil between people. It may indicate Dreaming of an accident involving more than one car indicates negative thoughts and pressures that you are exposed to. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he was involved in a car accident, he will become a victim of the conspiracy of others, and whoever sees a nearby car causing him an accident in a dream, he will hear the shocking and sad news. The vision of driving a car on a bumpy road The occurrence of an accident in a dream shows the damage that the dreamer will suffer from his bad effort, and a car accident on the way to a temple in a dream shows the harassment and obstacles that the dreamer faces. The dreamer is on his way to success. If you see a car accident and it overturns in a dream, this means that things will change for the worse, and whoever sees the car explode after the accident in a dream, this is evidence of loss in projects and money. A racing car accident in a dream is evidence of weakness and inability to perform duties, A truck accident in a dream shows great terror and disasters, and a dream of a train accident shows loss of hope in achieving desires. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s dream of a car accident: Dreaming of a car accident indicates that there are a lot of envy and haters. Ibn Shaheen also confirmed that falling from a car and an accident in a dream is evidence of a loss of control. On matters. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is falling from generation due to a traffic accident, then he will lose his authority and his word among the people, and seeing a road accident and falling into the sea in a dream means that he fell into it. Disorder. Seeing a car accident with family in a dream indicates their bad circumstances due to making wrong decisions, and dreaming of a car accident with an unknown person indicates serious experiences that the dreamer is going through. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it for a man. A dream about a car accident indicates for a man that he is facing many problems At work, if a man sees a car accident and escapes from it in a dream, then he will suffer from heartache that does not last long, and seeing a car accident and escaping from it in a dream for a married man indicates many problems with the woman. Which they end up reconciling. With regard to the interpretation of the dream of a car overturning and escaping from it for a man, it indicates his return to his senses after his recklessness and recklessness, and seeing a car overturning and remaining...
preview.text: Seeing a car accident in a dream symbolizes falling into trouble and distress as a result of bad actions, and the dream of overturning the car shows negative results at work due to recklessness. Whoever sees that he survives a car accident in a dream, this is evidence of temporary worries and problems that are approaching the end, and the accident in a dream in general is evidence of being exposed to a shock from human actions or as a result of work, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a car accident in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream of a car accident indicates a loss of pride and prestige among people Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of losing control of the car in a dream by falling into turmoil as a result of the following desires, and seeing a car accident due to fast driving in a dream may indicate recklessness in dealing with problems and difficulties, and whoever sees that you collide with another car and an accident occurs in a dream, collides with others, quarrels or quarrels. If you see an accident between two cars in a dream, this indicates great turmoil among people. The dream of an accident occurring between more than one car may indicate negative thoughts and pressures that you are exposed to. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has been in a car accident, he will become a victim of others' conspiracy, and whoever sees a nearby car that has an accident in a dream, hears shocking and sad news. Seeing Driving a car on a bumpy road and having an accident in a dream shows the harm that the dreamer will suffer from his bad effort, and a car accident on the way to a temple in a dream shows the harassment and obstacles that the dreamer faces. The dreamer is on his way to success. If you see a car accident and it overturns in a dream, this means that things will change for the worse. Whoever sees the car exploding after the accident in a dream, this is evidence of a loss in projects and money. A racing car accident in a dream is evidence of weakness and inability to perform duties, and a truck accident in a dream shows horror and great disasters, and a dream of a train accident shows a loss of hope from achieving desires. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen's dream of a traffic accident The dream of a car accident indicates that there is a lot of envy and haters. Ibn Shaheen also confirmed that falling from the car and the accident in a dream is evidence of losing control of things. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is falling from the generation due to a traffic accident, he loses his authority and his word among people, and seeing a road accident and falling into the sea in a dream means that he fell into it. Disorder. Seeing a car accident with the family in a dream indicates their bad circumstances due to making wrong decisions, and dreaming of a car accident with an unknown person indicates the serious experiences that the dreamer is going through. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it for a man The dream of a car accident for a man indicates that he is facing many problems at work. If a man sees a car accident and survives it in a dream, he suffers from a heartache that does not last long, and seeing a car accident and escaping from it in a dream for a married man indicates many problems with the woman. Which they end up reconciling. Regarding the interpretation of a dream about a car overturning and surviving it for a man, it indicates his return to his senses after his recklessness and recklessness, and seeing a car overturn and remaining

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for men

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for men: Seeing a man’s hair falling out in a dream has many different interpretations that we will explain below: When a man sees himself plucking his hair in a dream, this leads to some obstacles and crises in the coming period. It may indicate that the dreamer is the extravagant person who puts Money is in the wrong place. Seeing a man’s beautiful hair falling out indicates the occurrence of some bad events. The loss of valuable things for the dreamer, or this is a sign that he is going through some crises at work or family problems. Seeing a man’s curly hair falling out means revealing fears and that weakness will come soon. The dream of a man’s hair falling out in a dream symbolizes failure to fulfill promises, and God knows best. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of hair loss in men by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned several interpretations of seeing hair loss in a dream, the most prominent of which are the following: The dreamer who cuts his hair in a dream so that it does not fall out is considered one of the good dreams that symbolize achieving some profits and gains in the coming period. Seeing hair loss in a dream leads to achieving goals. Wishes come true, but after a lot of effort. When a man sees his hair gradually falling out in a dream This is a warning vision that symbolizes the need to pay attention to the dreamer’s actions and reconsider what he does. And take into account customs and traditions so that problems and judgments do not occur. Whoever sees his hair falling out and showing signs of fatigue and exhaustion, this is an indication of the many burdens and responsibilities that weigh him down and make him tired and busy most of the time. A man's beard hair loss indicates a decline in his status among people or his descent to certain levels of work. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for men from Nabulsi: Imam Nabulsi will present some signs that symbolize when seeing hair loss in a dream, which we summarize in the following: The dreamer is suffering from a difficult situation, so if He saw his hair falling out, this is a sign of increasing anxiety and poverty for him. If the dreamer is well-off, this indicates a loss of wealth. Dreaming of hair falling out from the front of the head in a dream indicates the occurrence of some rapid events for the pioneer and the occurrence of many developments in his life, some of which may It is negative and some is positive. Seeing hair loss at the back of the head symbolizes a delay in some of the dreamer’s dreams and goals. Seeing hair loss in a dream leads to some misfortunes and misfortunes that are difficult to get rid of. Dreaming of hair loss symbolizes the deterioration of social status, and the viewer suffers from oppression. And humiliation in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about men’s hair falling out when they touch it. When the dreamer sees his hair falling out when he touches it, this is a sign of all of the following: Seeing hair falling out when he touches it in a dream symbolizes wasting money without benefiting from it, or a sign that symbolizes the dreamer’s extravagance in Worthless matters. Whoever sees his hair falling out after another person touches it, this is a sign that he will fall into misfortune and crises because of that person in reality. If you dream that hair is falling out when you put it between

title: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream by Al-Osaimi and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing twins in a dream by Al-Osaimi and Al-NabulsiHaving twins is a good thing, especially for God-loving twins, as some are identical, completely similar, and some are non-identical twins, not completely similar. Raising twins is difficult, but it is a great blessing from God. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream by Al-Osaimi: Seeing a person as a double, this indicates in a dream that he is a good person and lives a good life. A person who sees twins arguing in a dream indicates that he may face very difficult problems. Seeing a sick twin indicates Announcement of bad news and a fleeting health crisis. A dreamer who dreams of a happy twin indicates good halal behavior that he can acquire. If the dreamer sees twins playing together, which indicates that he can live for a lot. If someone sees that he has male twins, this It indicates that he can obtain a prestigious position at work. Interpretation of twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the person of male twins in a dream shows the loss of his job and poverty. The dreamer who sees a married twin indicates that there are many rumors about him and his wife. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream. Seeing the person of twins in the dream, indicates Comfort and obtain sustenance and goodness almost. Seeing twins in a dream, and that he was married, means that his wife will soon become pregnant with virtuous offspring. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream according to Nabulsi. Seeing a person who has binoculars in a dream, this indicates that he is loved by those around him. If the dreamer sees that he has twins , a man and a woman, in a dream, it means that he can earn a lot of money after hardships and fatigue. See the person for twins who does not speak shows that he is going through many crises that require effort to solve them. See the dreamer whose twins get sick in a dream indicates the dreamer’s worries and sorrows. Interpretation of seeing twins in A dream by Ibn Shaheen. See the person for male twins. In a dream, this indicates exposure to unwanted things. Seeing twins in a dream means happiness and joy that he can enjoy in his life. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream. If the dreamer sees the difference in the shape of twins in a dream, this indicates great responsibility. You will fall on him. Seeing a person with twins crying in a dream indicates the obstacles that a person suffers from in reality. If one sees triplets in a dream, this means that he may face some big problems that may be solved and eliminated soon. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a man. Seeing a man for triplets in a dream If a man sees a male twin in a dream, this indicates the end of problems with his lover. It indicates his professional advancement and success in his work. Seeing a twin man in a dream indicates that he will soon obtain a lot of money, and this is lawful money. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a man

title: Interpretation of a dream about a girl dreaming about a girl who came to him in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the birth of a girl in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a girl with a single woman Seeing a newborn baby girl in a dream Seeing a girl in a dream for a single woman A girl in a dream with a pregnant woman Giving birth to a girl in a dream for a married woman Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream Interpretation of a dream of an adult girl Whoever brought a girl, or owned her, or seduced her - and did not descend in wakefulness - shows a rich world, no matter how good, and it will be easy, and for the pleasure of virgins wake up, and perhaps there will be difficulty. In this, because of their many contradictions. Like the rule of women, but easier. As for the old man, he goes, or a little interesting. The interpreter said: Look where the girl came from and explain to him. AlsoHe said: I saw that I gave birth to a beautiful girl, so I said: It is useful for planting and plants. Another said: I saw that a girl came to me from an elephant and the girl is pregnant, so I said: A boat coming from a country where Sudan is. And some kings said to me: I saw the pigs ropes, and they made me sailor girls. He said to me again: I saw that I was taking a gazelle out of the bellies of pigs, so I said: Take a group of prisoners. Another said: I saw that a girl came out to me from a bowl of water, and she was alone, and I covered her with a beautiful piece of cloth, so I said: There is a sea or a well near your house, so he said: Yes, I said: A thief will come to you from you who will take the furniture of the house, so he ran to him. Another said: I saw that a widow came to me from the cotton bow. I said: She is old and her voice has changed, she said: It is true and the king gives the old people their due. A man also said to me: I saw that I had many women, so I said: Your trees or plants or their fruits have withered. Another said: I saw that I had daughters and a man had intercourse with them, so I said: Do you sell the pots, so he said: Yes, I said: You break the pots according to their number. Another said: I saw that I trampled on many old ladies, so I said: Do you like to trample old women, he said: I will return to him. Another said: I saw old women cutting me, so I said: We fear for you in the days of miracles, either death from the cold, or the cold that prevents you from moving. The girl in the dream YouTube
